Welcome!



Welcome to the newsletter of the show The Split Hours, presented by me, Luminous Fox. In this newsletter, you'll get behind-the-scenes insights into the show, access to unreleased episodes from me, and recommendations for music, tips, and more from the Gothic scene. The first newsletter will be sent out soon.

See you soon! You can hear me every Saturday from 10 PM to midnight live on Mixcloud. Check the schedule at gothfox.github.io

Best regards,

Luminous Fox
item.dc:creator: Luminous Fox
